title: Lecture 1
content:
Shell vs. Editor You run the code below from the editor.
`type(5)` `print(3.0-1)` What’s printed?
 int  close  2.0  check  int then 2.0  close  nothing  close Check   Show Solution View video page Download video Download transcript Python vs. Math Which is allowed in Python?
 x + y = 2  close  x\*x = 2  close  2 = x  close  xy = 2  check  None of the Above  close Check   Show Solution View video page Download video Download transcript Bindings You run the code below from the file editor.
`usa_gold = 46` `uk_gold = 27` `romania_gold = 1` `total_gold = usa_gold + uk_gold + romania_gold` `print(total_gold)` `romania_gold += 1` `print(total_gold)` What’s printed?
 74 then 74  check  74 then 75  close  74  close  75  close Check   Show Solution View video page Download video Download transcript
